name: OnPlayerConnect
notes: This callback can also be called by NPC.
description: This callback is called when a player connects to the server.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player that connected.

return_values:
0 - Will prevent other filterscripts from receiving this callback.

 1 - Indicates that this callback will be passed to the next filterscript.

 It is always called first in filterscripts.
related_cb:
OnPlayerDisconnect: Called when a player leaves the server.
 OnIncomingConnection: Called when a player is attempting to connect to the server.
 OnPlayerFinishedDownloading: Called when a player finishes downloading custom models.
